Description:
Stunning new custom-designed home in a great position
Crafted for effortless contemporary living in a sought-after inner city pocket, this stunning new residence boasts a state-of-the-art custom design across two levels. It is located steps from city trams and just a short stroll to Moreland station, Sydney Road shops, local cafes and schools including St Fidelis Primary. Filled with natural light at the back is a spacious open plan living and dining area, which leads onto a private sunny courtyard. Dressed in marble benchtops, the stylish kitchen has stainless steel Smeg appliances, Fenix cabinetry and a walk-in pantry. Upstairs is a bright office or retreat, and plush master bedroom with a walk-in robe and ensuite. There is also a second ensuited bedroom plus a good sized downstairs bedroom and sleek marble bathroom. It features a separate laundry, European oak flooring, a Bosch alarm system, video intercom, ducted heating and cooling, data cabling, double glazing, a water tank and a double garage with an automatic roller door and ROW access.
Insights: 5 Saunders Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Chic urban living with city views
Boasting stunning city views throughout and promising chic urban living, this modern two-bedroom apartment offers investors and starters a brilliant entry to this coveted locale. The apartment comprises spacious living and meals with balcony, sleek kitchen featuring stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances, bedrooms with views and BIR's serviced by a stylish bathroom with a European laundry. Fabulously located between vibrant Sydney Road and Merri Creek parklands, the tram at your door and moments to the CBD. Together with electric heating, split system air-conditioning, secure entry, single car space and storage cage, and the building presenting a 6 star green rating, an inspection is a must!
Insights: 413/14-20 Nicholson Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Ready for your final touch!
In one of Coburg's best pockets lies this charming Edwardian home boasting plenty of potential. Only a stone's throw away to Coburg Primary & Secondary College, Coburg Lake, Upfield bike path, Coburg Leisure Centre, Sydney Road with the large choice of restaurants, cafes and supermarkets to choose from.
Walking into this family home, you will notice the amazing front facade however underneath the cladding is the original block weatherboard waiting to be brought back to life. With high press steel ceilings and Chandeliers, this Edwardian home boasts plenty of potential.
Featuring a grand size open kitchen/meals and family area with a gas cook top, an abundance of cupboard and bench space which is sure to impress. Overlooking the covered entertaining area and leading out to the good size backyard comprising of a variety of fruit trees, shed and a separate studio. With four generous size bedrooms, three of the bedrooms include their own fireplace and all serviced by the authentic timber bathroom with a bathtub.
Situated on a 457m2 approx block and complementing this home is a separate laundry, single garage with a workshop and ROW access.
This property provides a perfect start or a canvas for somebody to make it their own or great development site STCA, the choice is yours!
Insights: 15 White Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Start Of Something Special
Expressions of Interest closes 26th February at 5pm
Reach for success with the impressive potential presented by this three bedroom two bathroom home on approximately 370m2 at the heart of a lifestyle pocket. Meticulously maintained and offering a free flowing floorplan this home promises the start of something special. Featuring the lofty ceilings of its Bungalow beginnings, this home presents spacious living and dining flowing to a traditional kitchen/meals with 900mm Lofra range, huge laundry and additional cooking alcove with original wood-fired stove. The rear garden incorporates a large double garage accessed via ROW while heating/cooling and alarm assure comfort and security. Renovate or redevelop (subject to council approval) and capitalize on a location that delivers outstanding proximity to parks, schools, Melville Road trams, vibrant Sydney Road and CityLink.
Insights: 33 Jamieson Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
'Kincora' - Art Deco living designed to delight
This stunning three bedroom home reinvents the clean lines and geometric detail of its Art Deco heritage to deliver an exceptional family home of modern sophistication on approximately 549m2. Immaculately presented throughout, this gracious home showcasing ornate ceilings, picture rails and gleaming hardwood floors presents a sundrenched free flowing living domain. Quality shines through an AEG equipped island kitchen that anchors generous living and dining and opens to a huge entertainer's deck and gardens offering easy entertaining. Add to this a stylish modern bathroom, split system heating/cooling, ceiling fans and copious OSP offering lifestyle convenience. All moments to Coburg North Primary, O'Hea's Bakery, North Coburg Village, buses, and bustling Sydney Road.
Insights: 17 Francis Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Period Prize with Instant Style and Future Excellence
Immaculately maintained by the one family for decades, this quintessential solid-brick Art Deco residence presents an inner-urban lifestyle opportunity of immediate enjoyment along with exciting scope for those looking to enhance and expand (STCA). Beyond the captivating facade complete with secure entrance portico, the home's pristine interior comprises two main bedrooms (both with BIRs) and study/third bedroom, spotless central bathroom, elegant formal lounge and dining along with a separate kitchen/meals area and rear sunroom. Stand-out features include original Art Deco ceilings, lead-lights and stained timberwork, as well as heating, cooling and laundry with second shower. Step outside to an undercover patio overlooking a wonderfully private and serene backyard with established gardens and trees, plus a single lock-up garage. Anderson Reserve virtually across the road, it's situated in an idyllic family-friendly neighbourhood within easy reach of local schools, shopping centres, Sydney Road cafes, trains and trams to the CBD.
Land Size: 40.5 x 12.19 = 493 sqm approximately
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 61 Linda Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER OFFER
Completely reinvented, this eye-catching four bedroom, two bathroom home has been completely renovated from top to bottom. Beautiful Blackbutt timber flooring immediately appeal and lead the way past four generous size bedrooms. Further extending to an open kitchen/meals/living domain, complemented by a large decking area perfect for entertaining friends & family. With a kitchen fit for chief, it flaunts a Chevron tiled splashback, stone island bench, generous WIP and stainless steel Smeg appliances including a 900mm stove with 6 burner gas cooktop and dishwasher. Step into this magnificent master bedroom which offers sliding glass doors, making a grand entrance to this beautiful appointed ensuite â showcasing dual vanity, frameless shower and freestanding bath. Central bathroom offering great style with free standing vanity and frameless shower sure to impress the guests. With off street parking, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, WIR/BIR's and all a short stroll to Batman and Coburg Railway Stations, Coburg North Village shopping precinct, Coburg North Primary School, Sydney Road shops and cafÃ©s, Farmer's Market and the Merri Creek bike trail.

Description:
Renovate or Develop you Choose!
Retaining the character and elegance of its Victorian origins, this freestanding home provides an immediately functional environment along with an array of options for those looking to renovate and extend, rebuild or possibly redevelop (STCA) - all in a wonderfully quiet and convenient Coburg neighbourhood. Current floorplan comprises three large bedrooms and two bathrooms, spacious central lounge through to the kitchen/meals area. Features include gas heating and split-system air conditioning, high ceilings (front rooms) and original hallway fretwork. Step outside to a substantial backyard with external laundry, bungalow and garage/workshop via rear ROW. Walking distance to Sydney Road cafes, restaurants and city-bound trams, it's also close to local parks and popular primary schools as well as easy access to Coburg Station and renowned shopping precinct.

Description:
Fantastic Locale Convenience with Quality and Class
In a secure modern complex with De Chene Reserve and Merri Creek trails across the road, this second-floor apartment presents a terrific entry into Coburg or outstanding inner-urban investment opportunity. Impeccably-presented throughout, the home's as-new interior comprises two double bedrooms (both with built-in robes) and sleek central bathroom with floor-to-ceiling tiles, light-filled open living/dining area leading out to a fully-undercover balcony. Add to this a classy kitchen with soft-close drawers, tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other highlights include split-system a/c and additional panel heaters, new carpets and floors, modern full-size laundry, plus lift access to secure entry foyer, undercover parking space and storage cage. City-bound trams at your doorstep, it's also close to primary and secondary schools, as well as Sydney Road cafes, restaurants and vibrant shopping precinct. Easy modern living or blue-chip investing! Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 15/203 Nicholson Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Period poise and modern elegance
From its graceful double fronted facade to soaring ceilings, delicate details and sleek contemporary features this beautifully renovated three bedroom period home excels. Beyond restful double bedrooms and two elegant bathrooms, including an ensuite, the home opens into a quality kitchen/dining/living boasting a 900mm stove, Bosch dishwasher, waterfall stone island and bifolds to an entertainer's deck. Further features include polished floorboards, double glazing, deep cornices, solar electricity, central heating and ducted cooling. External strengths encompass landscaping, a sprinkler system, wide garage and extra OSP linked to a rear ROW. Superbly convenient, walking distance to Woolworths, train, trams and tempting cafes, also close to popular Coburg Market.

Brimming With Light and Charisma
Set in one of Coburg's prized locations on an amazing corner allotment measuring 13.41 x 39.17 (525sqm), this character filled Californian Bungalow offers immediate comfort, whilst presenting the ability to renovate, rebuild or develop (STCA). Showcasing a wide Cedar Panelled entrance hall that provides access to 3 generous bedrooms, a street facing lounge, central bathroom and a kitchen/meals area opening to the spacious rear yard.
Brimming with light and period decor leadlight windows, plate rails and polished Baltic Pine floors shine through its expansive interiors.
All in a location boasting easy access to both Sydney Road and Melville Road shopping and trams, local cafes, Coburg Farmer's Market, O'Heas Bakery and quality schools including Coburg West and St Fidelis Primary.

This superb opportunity is made even better by its prime position, only seconds walk to Batman Train Station (Zone 1), the number 19 Tram, and in close proximity to Coburg North Village Shopping Centre, Sydney Road Shopping/CafÃ© Precinct & Coburg Lake.

Description:
HUGE PRICE REDUCTION
Walk to everything, Coburg Train Station, Sydney Road trams, Coburg Leisure Centre and Bridges Reserve, Merri Creek and numerous restaurants and cafe's of bustling Coburg and schools. This charming Californian Bungalow offers 3 bedrooms with BIRs, central bathroom, separate lounge or 4th bedroom, a generous kitchen/meals area and family room overlooking decking and a spacious back garden. Includes ducted heating, cooling and off street parking. Located between Sydney Road and Nicholson Street.
INSPECT BY APPOINTMENT
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Boutique Living in the Heart of Coburg
Delightful near-new apartment securely set on the 2nd floor offers privacy, comfort and location, all the ingredients for the perfect home or investment.
Instantly impressive, high quality common areas set the scene for this master built apartment.
Open plan living design with loads of natural light leading to a balcony with panoramic views.
The main double bedroom has built-in robes and a stylish ensuite bathroom.
A quality kitchen with ample cupboard space, Bosch cooking appliances & dishwasher will impress.
Attractions include:
Split-system heating/cooling, polished concrete floors, European laundry, security video intercom, lift access to secure entry foyer and off street car parking at the rear.
Simply walk out your front door to hop on a tram or grab a coffee at one of the many local cafes Sydney Rd has to offer.
A real gem indeed.
Total area: 56m2.

Description:
Make Your Mark
Strategically situated steps from Sydney Rd, the appeal of the land ensures that the development/extension (STCA) of this delightful home is an appealing proposition, all the while offering choices to further modernise or enjoy its present charm.
- High ceilings, picture rails and plenty of character
- Inviting archway links lounge and dining areas
- An open fireplace complements gas heater
- Two bedrooms, main with built in robes and air conditioning
- Neat renovated bathroom
- Older style kitchen/meals with terrific potential
- Northerly garden backdrop highlights future options
- Full-size laundry, spacious shed storage
- Stroll to Coburg's best cafes and restaurants
- Close to trams, trains and Upfield bike path
